title: Spack compiler wrapper fails to set the correct CC, mixes MPICC from one compiler with CC from another.
body:
Spack erroneously sets CC,FC to wrong compiler and mixes MPICC from one compiler with a different CC.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```
[sajid@xrmlite ~]$ spack install petsc+complex ^intel-mkl@2018.3.222 ^openmpi %gcc@7.3.0       
...                             
==> Installing petsc
==> Searching for binary cache of petsc
==> Warning: No Spack mirrors are currently configured
==> No binary for petsc found: installing from source
==> Fetching http://ftp.mcs.anl.gov/pub/petsc/release-snapshots/petsc-3.10.2.tar.gz
######################################################################## 100.0%
==> Staging archive: /home/sajid/packages/spack/var/spack/stage/petsc-3.10.2-fqbenzsyao3bpbwpmtupmsykyl365ns6/petsc-3.10.2.tar.gz
==> Created stage in /home/sajid/packages/spack/var/spack/stage/petsc-3.10.2-fqbenzsyao3bpbwpmtupmsykyl365ns6
==> No patches needed for petsc
==> Building petsc [Package]
==> Executing phase: 'install'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' 'MAKE_NP=32'

4 errors found in build log:
     2044    ifort: command line warning #10006: ignoring unknown option '-fgcc-name=/home/sajid/packages/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_
             64/gcc-4.8.5/gcc-7.3.0-xyzezhjmbiebkjfoakso464rhfshlkyq/bin/'
     2045    ifort: command line warning #10006: ignoring unknown option '-fgcc-name=/home/sajid/packages/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_
             64/gcc-4.8.5/gcc-7.3.0-xyzezhjmbiebkjfoakso464rhfshlkyq/bin/'
     2046         CLINKER arch-linux2-c-opt/lib/libpetsc.so.3.10.2
     2047    ld: arch-linux2-c-opt/obj/sys/objects/f2003-src/fsrc/optionenum.o: relocation R_X86_64_32S against `__STRLITPACK_0' can not be 
             used when making a shared object; recompile with -fPIC
     2048    ld: arch-linux2-c-opt/obj/sys/classes/bag/f2003-src/fsrc/bagenum.o: relocation R_X86_64_32S against `__STRLITPACK_0' can not be
              used when making a shared object; recompile with -fPIC
     2049    ld: arch-linux2-c-opt/obj/sys/f90-mod/petscsysmod.o: relocation R_X86_64_32 against symbol `petscsys_mp_petsc_null_character_' 
             can not be used when making a shared object; recompile with -fPIC
  >> 2050    ld: final link failed: Nonrepresentable section on output
  >> 2051    gmake[2]: *** [arch-linux2-c-opt/lib/libpetsc.so.3.10.2] Error 1
     2052    gmake[2]: Leaving directory `/tmp/sajid/spack-stage/spack-stage-RiLL7C/petsc-3.10.2'
  >> 2053    gmake[1]: *** [gnumake] Error 2
     2054    gmake[1]: Leaving directory `/tmp/sajid/spack-stage/spack-stage-RiLL7C/petsc-3.10.2'
     2055    **************************ERROR*************************************
     2056      Error during compile, check arch-linux2-c-opt/lib/petsc/conf/make.log
     2057      Send it and arch-linux2-c-opt/lib/petsc/conf/configure.log to petsc-maint@mcs.anl.gov
     2058    ********************************************************************
  >> 2059    make: *** [all] Error 1

See build log for details:
  /home/sajid/packages/spack/var/spack/stage/petsc-3.10.2-fqbenzsyao3bpbwpmtupmsykyl365ns6/petsc-3.10.2/spack-build.out

```


Looking at `spack-build.env` the issue becomes clear : 
```
[sajid@xrmlite ~]$ cd /home/sajid/packages/spack/var/spack/stage/petsc-3.10.2-fqbenzsyao3bpbwpmtupmsykyl365ns6/petsc-3.10.2/
[sajid@xrmlite petsc-3.10.2]$ cat spack-build.env | grep ifort
export F77="/home/sajid/packages/spack/lib/spack/env/intel/ifort"
export FC="/home/sajid/packages/spack/lib/spack/env/intel/ifort"
export SPACK_F77="/opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2018.3.222/linux/bin/intel64/ifort"
export SPACK_FC="/opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2018.3.222/linux/bin/intel64/ifort"
[sajid@xrmlite petsc-3.10.2]$ cat spack-build.env | grep icc
export CC="/home/sajid/packages/spack/lib/spack/env/intel/icc"
export MPICC="/home/sajid/packages/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/openmpi-3.1.3-tfdsutupnrf4fdceglyl4qo5rrekvb6s/bin/mpicc"
export SPACK_CC="/opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2018.3.222/linux/bin/intel64/icc"
```
Spack picks up the correct MPICC (from the `openmpi%gcc@7.3.0`) but mixes this with intel compilers (which were never specified). 

### Information on your system
 1. OS : linux-centos7-x86_64
 2. `compilers.yaml`: 
```
[sajid@xrmlite ~]$ cd .spack/linux/
[sajid@xrmlite linux]$ cat compilers.yaml 
compilers:
- compiler:
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    modules: []
    operating_system: centos7
    paths:
      cc: /usr/bin/gcc
      cxx: /usr/bin/g++
      f77: /usr/bin/gfortran
      fc: /usr/bin/gfortran
    spec: gcc@4.8.5
    target: x86_64
- compiler:
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths:
    - /opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2018.3.222/linux/compiler/lib/intel64
    - /opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2018.3.222/linux/compiler/lib/intel64_lin
    - /home/sajid/packages/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/gcc-7.3.0-xyzezhjmbiebkjfoakso464rhfshlkyq/lib64
    flags:
      cflags: -xcore-avx2 -gcc-name=/home/sajid/packages/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/gcc-7.3.0-xyzezhjmbiebkjfoakso464rhfshlkyq/bin/gcc
      cxxflags: -xcore-avx2 -gcc-name=/home/sajid/packages/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/gcc-7.3.0-xyzezhjmbiebkjfoakso464rhfshlkyq/bin/g++
      fflags: -xcore-avx2 --gcc-name=/home/sajid/packages/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/gcc-7.3.0-xyzezhjmbiebkjfoakso464rhfshlkyq/bin/
    modules:
    - intel18
    operating_system: centos7
    paths:
      cc: /opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2018.3.222/linux/bin/intel64/icc
      cxx: /opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2018.3.222/linux/bin/intel64/icpc
      f77: /opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2018.3.222/linux/bin/intel64/ifort
      fc: /opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2018.3.222/linux/bin/intel64/ifort
    spec: intel@18.0.3
    target: x86_64
- compiler:
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags:
     cflags: -march=haswell
     cxxflags: -march=haswell
    modules: []
    operating_system: centos7
    paths:
      cc: /home/sajid/packages/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/gcc-7.3.0-xyzezhjmbiebkjfoakso464rhfshlkyq/bin/gcc
      cxx: /home/sajid/packages/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/gcc-7.3.0-xyzezhjmbiebkjfoakso464rhfshlkyq/bin/g++
      f77: /home/sajid/packages/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/gcc-7.3.0-xyzezhjmbiebkjfoakso464rhfshlkyq/bin/gfortran
      fc: /home/sajid/packages/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/gcc-7.3.0-xyzezhjmbiebkjfoakso464rhfshlkyq/bin/gfortran
    spec: gcc@7.3.0
    target: x86_64
```
